# American Flags | Magento Commerce Case Studies

Read how Krish helped American Flags, the most trusted names in America for flags to establish their digital presence on Magento platform. After the launch, the brand noticed 200% growth in target audience.


Back To Work North America Solution B2C SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth SupportHyva Themes Implementation INDUSTRY Consumer Goods WEBSITE americanflags.com 43% Average load time decreased 200% Increase in target audience 120% Increase in average orders per day American Flags Hoists Amplified Customer Engagement Committed to the country’s pride Founded in New York just days after September 11, 2001, AmericanFlags.com is among the world's largest suppliers of residential and commercial American flags. Serving just the B2B industry, the brand features a wide array of products including American flags, historic flags, military flags, world flags, state flags, residential and commercial flagpoles, banners, bunting, and patriotic memorabilia. They have partnered with Krish since 2018. In the face of impossible odds, people who love this country can change it. Barack Obama Challenges Understanding the sky Store Performance was not up to the mark. Checkout Abandonment was high. The search was not performing well. There were design flaws and important content was not being highlighted. Solution Finding direction amidst strong waves Considering the wide range of products, the target audience, and the challenges outlined by the client, our team conducted an in-depth analysis to re-authenticate buyer behavior. To enhance performance and user experience, we implemented a comprehensive optimization strategy, including the integration of CloudFront for efficient content delivery. As a part of the long-term roadmap, our team implemented the Hyvä Theme along with Hyva Checkout customization and Google Address Auto-complete at Checkout, leveraging its lightweight architecture and reduced JavaScript complexity to significantly improve page speed, enhance SEO, and deliver a seamless, high-performance shopping experience. The Strategy Our approach focused on a comprehensive optimization of the store, leveraging CloudFront and Varnish to enhance content delivery and caching efficiency. To further elevate performance and user engagement, we implemented the Hyvä Theme, ensuring a faster, more responsive storefront with improved Core Web Vitals. Key enhancements included a streamlined One-Step Checkout to reduce cart abandonment, an upgraded search experience with ElasticSearch, seamless Social Integrations, and a restructured Checkout Flow. With a primary focus on delivering a superior user experience, these optimizations created a high-performing, conversion-driven eCommerce platform. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Dr. Jeffrey Reynolds President/CEO Result Rising High with a New Look Proposed Change With a refreshed look, a new Magento B2B store, and the implementation of the Hyvä Theme, the brand saw significant improvements soon after launch. The lightweight and performance-focused frontend contributed to a 43% increase in mobile traffic, driving higher engagement. Enhanced interface and user experience optimizations led to a 20% boost in revenue and an 18% increase in average order value. Additionally, Hyvä’s efficient rendering and reduced JavaScript complexity helped cut the average load time to just 2.6 seconds, delivering a faster, more seamless shopping experience.
